=======================================================================--> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://csi.cingular.com/CSI/Namespaces/Container/Public/InquireFiberServiceAssignedProductDetailsRequest.xsd" version="206.0.00" xmlns="http://csi.cingular.com/CSI/Namespaces/Container/Public/InquireFiberServiceAssignedProductDetailsRequest.xsd" xmlns:cdm="http://csi.att.com/CSI/Namespaces/OrderAndSubscriptionManagementEntertainment/Types/Public/CommonDataModel.xsd" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:import namespace="http://csi.att.com/CSI/Namespaces/OrderAndSubscriptionManagementEntertainment/Types/Public/CommonDataModel.xsd" schemaLocation="CommonDataModel.xsd"/> <xs:element name="InquireFiberServiceAssignedProductDetailsRequest" type="InquireFiberServiceAssignedProductDetailsRequestInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Retrieves an assigned product configuration as the basis for the user to select features and services and specify values of attributes. This API should be called only once in the ordering flow</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="InquireFiberServiceAssignedProductDetailsRequestInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ProductFilterDetails"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="OrderedItemDetails" type="cdm:FiberServiceOrderedItemsDetailsInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Input to retrieve the dynamicProductdetails currently assigned to a customer</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GlobalCustomerDetails"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Input to retrieve assigned product details</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="productStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Active AC, Ceased CE or Suspended SU</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>Active AC, Ceased CE or Suspended SU</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SU"/> <xs:enumeration value="AC"/> <xs:enumeration value="CE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="productState"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ordered OR, Cancelled CA or Assigned AS</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OR"/> <xs:enumeration value="CA"/> <xs:enumeration value="AS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustomerIdentifier"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>UverseAccountInfo</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="memberID" type="cdm:FiberServiceMemberIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>accountLoginID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="accountNumber" type="cdm:BillingAccountNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This Account number will accomodate mulitple account types, such as a Uverse account and DTV account.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="AssignedProductFilterDetails"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="serviceTypeList" type="cdm:FiberServiceComponentTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>such as STB, GP, HSIA, IPTV ..</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="componentCodeList" type="cdm:FiberServiceComponentTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Such as STBConsole,STBSDDVR,FLIX,HBO ..</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="attributeCodeList"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>such as Manufacturer,ModelNumber,stbType</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="255"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="assignedServiceFilterType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>such as ServiceData(S) or ServiceData and PricePlanDetails (SP)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:whiteSpace value="collapse"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="SP"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ProductInputDetails" type="cdm:ProductInputInfo"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="BundledInputDetails" type="cdm:AssignedBundledDetailsInfo"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<!--=========================================================================

=======================================================================--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://csi.att.com/CSI/Namespaces/OrderAndSubscriptionManagementEntertainment/Types/Public/CommonDataModel.xsd" elementFormDefault="qualified" version="210.0.00" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://csi.att.com/CSI/Namespaces/OrderAndSubscriptionManagementEntertainment/Types/Public/CommonDataModel.xsd"> <xs:simpleType name="ATTIDInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An ATT User ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ActionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Add = A, Remove = R, Update = U, Query = Q this is a default value which means that the data was retrieved with some inquiry and the action has no meaning since it will not change the data on the backend.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="Q"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AddressCityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The City of this address.Mandatory only when Address type = 'Street', 'Military', 'P.O. Box', or 'Rural Route'.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AddressId"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>AMNQ Address Id. name="AuthenticationInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The selected authentication question or answer to the question.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BandwidthIndInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Bandwidth Indicator to indicate whether this BW values are Actual, Estimate etc. Valid values are "E", "A", "U".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{8}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{9}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{12}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{13}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BillingTelephoneNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing Telephone Number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BooleanTrueInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"> <xs:pattern value="true"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CLLI11Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Common Language Location Identifier in 8 or 11 character format. Relates to wireline circuit.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CLLI8Info"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Common Language Location Identifier in 8 character format. Relates to a successfully validated Service Address - sbcServingOfficeWirecenter. For example - "78541256".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="8"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CPENameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the Customer Premise Equipment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CombinedBillingStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Where: Y - Combined N - De-Combined, Not Enrolled P - Pending Combine D - Combined Billing Declined F - Future Dated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="Y"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value=" "/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ContactLineInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="250"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ContactPhonePurposeInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ContactPhoneTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The type of the phone. For example - Home Phone,Cell Phone,Work Phone.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CouponIdInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CreditRiskInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The credit risk of the contact. For example - "Unknown" should be send for Anonymous user.</xs:documentation> <xs:documentation>Valid Values - LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, UNKNOWN.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CurrencyAmountInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A monetary currency value</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:pattern value="\-?\d{0,9}(\.\d{1,2})?"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DTVAccountNumberInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{1,10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateTime24HourStringInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date/time stamp in UTC format. The following formats are accepted: YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - HH indicates the hour, zero pre-pended - 24 is a fixed character, indicating the 24 hour time format - MI indicates the minute, zero pre-pended - SS indicates the second, zero pre-pended</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateTimeWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date/time stamp in UTC format. The following formats are accepted: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.xxxZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - T is a fixed character, indicating the time section - hh indicates the hour, zero pre-pended - mm indicates the minute, zero pre-pended - ss indicates the second, zero pre-pended - xxx indicates the millisecond, zero pre-pended - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"> <xs:pattern value=".+T.+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date in UTC format. The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DDZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"> <xs:pattern value=".+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateWithoutTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date with no timezone information. The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DD Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EditTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It indicates the control to be shown for the property. For example - RadioButton, DropDown, checkBox</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="7"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EffectiveDateInfo"> <xs:restriction base="DateWithTimezoneInfo"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EidCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Value selected by CSR from the Equifax website.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EmailAddressInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>E-Mail Address</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ExchangeCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Exchange code only for ServiceMSAG. For example - "exco".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceAccountNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This is Uverse billing account number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceAccountSubTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>H - Consumer Home Office R - Consumer S - Consumer Employee 9 - Consumer Small Office E - Enterprise Business A - ASE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="9"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceAccountTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>I - Consumer</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBANStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Account Status. C ? CANCELED O ? OPENED S ? SUSPENDED T ? TENTATIVE P - Pending in CRM (has not been submitted to ENABLER) H - Error; the maxium number of retry attempts has occurred. E - Error; ENABLER returned an error for the transaction B - Submitted to ENABLER and waiting on a response. Valid values are "C","O","S","T", "P","H","E","B".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBandwidthEligibilityIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Bandwidth ineligibility Indicator: "0"- eligible, "-1" - bandwidth is empty, "-2" - No bandwidth value that meets LS medium profile minimum bandwidth value. For example - "true" or "false".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBaseOfferIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Offer id of rack rate, prepopulated by OMS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBaseOfferInstanceIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing id of rack rate, prepopulated by OMS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillCycleDescriptionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Bill cycle description for the current bill cycle in Wireline Billing System. Read-only.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillCycleInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Current bill cycle in Wireline Billing System. This value will be in the response of getCustomerDetails and client need to send this value as it is back in updatecustomerdetails API.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillingCustomerSubTypeCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid values - "Loyalty","Spend","Vulnerability".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:enumeration value="Loyalty"/> <xs:enumeration value="Spend"/> <xs:enumeration value="Vulnerability"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillingCustomerTypeCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid value - "Direct Bill".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> <xs:enumeration value="Direct Bill"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillingTelephoneNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>FiberService Billing telephone number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="13"/> <xs:maxLength value="13"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceChargeDescriptionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains the enabler charge description.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="1300"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceCircuitIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fiber service pipe circuitId. For example - A6/MCXX/000108//SB</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceComponentDisplayNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the component to be diplayed. For example - U-verse TV, HSIA, CVOIP, VOIPLN, VOIPDL, CW</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceControlTimeStamp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceCrossProductPackageIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CrossProductPackage ID. The customer can choose between selecting couponid or cross product package id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceCustomerTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Customer type. [ I = {Consumer}, B = Business, L = Lightspeed ]. B and L is supported only in InquireWirelineCreditVerificationQuestions interface.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceElementKeyInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ACS Element key will contain the code by which the URL type would be identified. B=Bonded pair exhaust (granite)*only one port avail for pair bonding BB=Bonded pair exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary BP=Bonded pair exhaust and YZP on primary BS=Bonded pair exhaust and YZP on secondary C=Card exhaust (granite) CB=Card exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary CP=Card exhaust and YZP on primary CS=Card exhaust and YZP on secondary P=Port exhaust (granite) PB=Port exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary PP=Port exhaust and YZP on primary PS=Port exhaust and YZP on secondary S=Shelf exhaust (granite) SB=Shelf exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary SP=Shelf exhaust and YZP on primary SS=Shelf exhaust and YZP on secondary YB=YZP on both primary and secondary YP=YZP on primary YS=YZP on secondary UN=Unconditioned and NO exhaust BU=Unconditioned and Bonded Pair Exhaust CU=Unconditioned and Card Exhaust PU=Unconditioned and Port Exhaust SU=Unconditioned and Shelf Exhaust</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="BB"/> <xs:enumeration value="BP"/> <xs:enumeration value="BS"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="CB"/> <xs:enumeration value="CP"/> <xs:enumeration value="CS"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="PB"/> <xs:enumeration value="PP"/> <xs:enumeration value="PS"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="SB"/> <xs:enumeration value="SP"/> <xs:enumeration value="SS"/> <xs:enumeration value="YB"/> <xs:enumeration value="YP"/> <xs:enumeration value="YS"/> <xs:enumeration value="UN"/> <xs:enumeration value="BU"/> <xs:enumeration value="CU"/> <xs:enumeration value="PU"/> <xs:enumeration value="SU"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMemberIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The unverified member id in email address format. For example - qay2002@att.net</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="51"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMessageDetailCodeInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMessageDetailDescriptionInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMessageDetailSeverityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid values - "Info", "Warning", "USER_ERROR"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceNADTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fiber service last Network Access Device type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="INID"/> <xs:enumeration value="RG"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product category/service. For example - "HDSTREAM", "SDSTREAM", "HSIAPRO", "HSIAELITE", "HSIAEXPRESS", "CVOIP".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceNetworkTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of network transport. For example - "FTTP", "FTTN", "GPON", "RGPON".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderActionIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>OrderActionId is the unique key for the OrderAction of a particular product</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderActionNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of order action:[PR - "Provide", CH - "Change", CE - "Cease", SU - "Suspend", RS - "Resume", CW-"ChangeOwner", SS- "SoftSuspend", SR-"SoftResume" , PV-"ProvideMove" , CM-"CeaseMove"]</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PR"/> <xs:enumeration value="CH"/> <xs:enumeration value="CE"/> <xs:enumeration value="SU"/> <xs:enumeration value="RS"/> <xs:enumeration value="CW"/> <xs:enumeration value="SS"/> <xs:enumeration value="SR"/> <xs:enumeration value="PV"/> <xs:enumeration value="CM"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SRM-BIS Order Number. Example:"N2051234345"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderedItemsActivityNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This attribute depends upon the order action (Provide / Change). For example - acsAssignedProductView.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="2000"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePaperBillSuppressionIndInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Paper bill suppression indicator in Wireline Billing System "N" ? {no paper} "F" ? {full paper}</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceParentApidInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ap id of rack rate that promotion belong to, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "987654321".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceProductIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A unique identifier of the product in OMS. For example - "600046057"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceProductRelationIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Product Catalog relation ID this item implements. For example - "2110660"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionCustSubTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion customer subtype, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "S".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionDMAInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion DMA, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "Yahoo! Broadband".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionPrimaryIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion primary indicator, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "A".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionRankInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion ranking (the lowest ranking is the best), prepopulated by OMS. For example - "9999".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionSaleTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion sale type (basic or additional/stackable promotion), prepopulated by OMS. Valid values - "B", "A".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionSpeedInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion speed, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "Express".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionStreamInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion Stream, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "I".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceRecPymTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment method code in Wireline Billing System if the customer is enrolled in a recurring payment. For example - "Online".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fiber service core component type. Valid values are given below CVOIP, HSIA, VBP.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FirstNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FormattedNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="65"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="HandicapIndInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Default Value: false. Valid values are "Y", "N".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IdentificationIssuingAuthorityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification Issuing Authority i.e. state code for Drivers Licenses</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IdentificationTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification Type DriversLicense = DL</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="DL"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LanguageInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The language of the account.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LanguagePreferenceInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Language Indicator: English Standard = E, Spanish Standard = S, English Prorated = N, Spanish Prorated = P, Braille = B, Large Font = L, French = F, Vietnamese = V, Mandarin = M, Cantonese = C, Korean = K, Tagalong = T, Japanese = J</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="V"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="K"/> <xs:enumeration value="T"/> <xs:enumeration value="J"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LastNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LegalEntityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Legal Entity code. For example - TT00</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LinkKeyInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Link Key - contains the code to describe the type of address or contact. Address: M - ServiceUSPS U - ServiceSAG D - ServiceFSP B - Billing F - Shipping E - Alternate P - PPU_ADDR G - MSAG_ADD_TYPE L - CLEC_ADD_TYPE H - Directory Listing I - E911
Contact: C - Primary Contact A - Authorized S - Lead</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="G"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LocationInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Location code for the physical/logical store being commissioned.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OfferDefinitionIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Used only by acs for internal purpose. Product Catalogue Identifier. For example - 2000021</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OfferingCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Cingular Billing System Code for an offering (Telegence SOC or CARE Feature).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneNpaNxxInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreferredContactModeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Preferred contact mode. For example - Primary Phone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PropertyIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Will hold the propertyID. Only for acs use. For example - "2000405"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PropertyNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the property. Only for acs use. For example - Which U-verse TV package would you like?</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RateCenterCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate Center code. For example - ALHAMBRA.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SalesChannelInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Values such as COR - Retail applications, WEB - Online applications, WCC - Wireline Call Center, CSR - Customer Service Representative, IVR - Interactive Voice Response, SOE - Sales Order Entry, SYSX - System X</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="WEB"/> <xs:enumeration value="COR"/> <xs:enumeration value="WCC"/> <xs:enumeration value="CSR"/> <xs:enumeration value="IVR"/> <xs:enumeration value="SOE"/> <xs:enumeration value="TE"/> <xs:enumeration value="ITV"/> <xs:enumeration value="SYSX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SalesRepresentativeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sales Representative ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SatelliteAccessCardIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Satellite Access Card Id Information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DO NOT USE THIS TYPE IN SCHEMAS - Base type for encrypted elements, Always use derived/extended types listed below</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedDateOfBirthInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Date of Birth The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DD Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: BIRTH_DATE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:pattern value="\S{4}-\S{2}-\S{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedGenericInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Used for data that needs to be BASE64 encoded. Clients who are volted need to pass in a minimum of 15 characters - see the CSO BASE64 documentation to find details on how to pad stings to reach the 15 character limit. Following special charcaters are pass through [space] EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: B64_GENERIC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedNumericPassCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Pin .When sending plain text - only numeric values are allowed. Following are pass through characters space & - ; @ \ ^ | EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: ALLNUM_PIN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="4"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedPersonalIdentificationInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Personal Ids. Characters must be UPPER CASE. Ex:Drivers License Number and other personal Ids. Dashes are pass through characters. EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: DRIVER_LIC_NUM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="6"/> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedSocialSecurityNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Social Security Number, also used for Business Tax Id. When sending plain text send only numbers. Dashes are pass through characters. EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: ALLNUM_SSN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:length value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="StreamBandwidthUnitInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Specifies the up/downstream bandwidth measurement. For example - KILOBITS_PER_SECOND.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriberIdInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="120"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubscriberStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>RESERVED - R, ACTIVE - A, CANCELLED - C, SUSPENDED - S, RELEASED - L</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TaxCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Received from AMNQ. Tax code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TelephoneNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Standard 10 digit Telephone Number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="10"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{10}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TitleInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The title of the contact</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TransactionIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The CCM transaction number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TrueFalseInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>To be used only for optional element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="true"/> <xs:enumeration value="false"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="UniversalBillingAccountNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing account number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{9}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{10}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{12}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{13}"/> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{17}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="UserIdTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>the classification of the userid; this could be a simple username, or a Cingular cuid, or a CSR id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ValidValueInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid values for the component. Maps to the code in the domain inside Item Property in the facade. For example - U200, U300, U400</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ValidatedEmailAddressInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>E-mail address format which contains @ sign followed by a dot format validation. Example: username@att.com</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> <xs:pattern value=".+@.+\..+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="WirelineCircuitIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Service pipe circuitId. Building name/company name /business name (if exists - relevant for billing/alternate address only), e.g., XYZ Company 3. Address line - apt number (if applicable), e.g., Apt 1010 4. Address line - house number, street and directional (if applicable), e.g.,123 Main St. W 5. City, state, and zip, e.g., San Francisco CA 94123-4567
If the length of the address line (#4) which includes the house number, street and directional is above 30 characters they should be adjusted it to fit into 30 characters. base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="255"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bundleActionType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Applicable action type for the bundle NP-A: New Titan customer has no existing Titan supported services NP-US: New Titan customer has existing Core Products ATT services (e.g. existing wireless on M-TLG , DTV, etc) and adds a Core Product (Uverse, core Generic IP services, new Wireless or DTV). CH-US: Existing Titan customer adds another Core Product (e.g. U-verse customer adds new wireless converge and/or DTV, Mobility Titan adds U-verse and/or DTV) or/and an existing Titan customer with Uverse, adds one or more core Uverse services (ex. IPTV, HSIA, CVOIP, Generic IP). NP-C: A customer without an existing Titan Ban requests a wireless BAN to be converged bill (for new or existing wireless customer) and there are no Titan bundles available to be returned for any other action types (e.g. Upsell , NP-A, etc) except Save. CH-C: A customer with existing products/ services, on a Titan BAN, requests an existing wireless to be converged bill and there are no Titan bundles available to be returned for Upsell and Upgrade Action Types any other action types (e.g. Upsell , Upgrade,etc) CH-UG: Existing Titan customer selects to upgrade IPTV Basic Package, HSIA Speed, Voice Usage Plan, and/or GenIP services. CH-S: Base on rep profile in CRM channel and selection (de-selection) rules and based on Titan 5.1 user and customer eligibility rules for System X channel. CH-O: Based on no other Action Type being applicable or only the Save action type is applicable. US: Upsell UG: Upgrade O: Other S: Save</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="US"/> <xs:enumeration value="UG"/> <xs:enumeration value="O"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="NP-A"/> <xs:enumeration value="NP-US"/> <xs:enumeration value="CH-US"/> <xs:enumeration value="NP-C"/> <xs:enumeration value="CH-C"/> <xs:enumeration value="CH-UG"/> <xs:enumeration value="CH-S"/> <xs:enumeration value="CH-O"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="singleCreditIndicator" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates whether the bundle is for single credit</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="singleCreditDescription" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The text message to describe single credit of the bundle</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="255"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="wirelessChangeType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>indicates whether core product/service (e.g. hsia, iptv, cvoip DTV, wireless converged) must be upgraded in order to qualifiy for the bundle - (unconverted legacy DTV, still billed in STMS but has a shell account in Enabler for combined-bill purposes) c. ?New_DTV? (previously indicated by enum = ?N?) -new DTV standalone or unified account, natively billed in Enabler d. ?Converted_DTV? The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DDZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"> <xs:pattern value=".+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="faultSequenceNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="faultLevel" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="faultCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="faultDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="cingularErrorCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="cingularErrorDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="cingularErrorCategory" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CSIApplicationException"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Response"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="ServiceProviderEntity" type="ServiceProviderEntityInfo"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

The following formats are accepted: YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - HH indicates the hour, zero pre-pended - 24 is a fixed character, indicating the 24 hour time format - MI indicates the minute, zero pre-pended - SS indicates the second, zero pre-pended</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateTimeWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date/time stamp in UTC format. The following formats are accepted: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.xxxZ Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day - T is a fixed character, indicating the time section - hh indicates the hour, zero pre-pended - mm indicates the minute, zero pre-pended - ss indicates the second, zero pre-pended - xxx indicates the millisecond, zero pre-pended - Z is a fixed character, indicating UTC time zone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"> <xs:pattern value=".+T.+Z"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DateWithTimezoneInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Designates a date in UTC format. For example - "exco".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceAccountNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This is Uverse billing account number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceAccountSubTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>H - Consumer Home Office R - Consumer S - Consumer Employee 9 - Consumer Small Office E - Enterprise Business A - ASE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="R"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="9"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceAccountTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>I - Consumer</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBANStatusInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Account Status. C ? CANCELED O ? OPENED S ? SUSPENDED T ? TENTATIVE P - Pending in CRM (has not been submitted to ENABLER) H - Error; the maxium number of retry attempts has occurred. E - Error; ENABLER returned an error for the transaction B - Submitted to ENABLER and waiting on a response. Valid values are "C","O","S","T", "P","H","E","B".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBandwidthEligibilityIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Bandwidth ineligibility Indicator: "0"- eligible, "-1" - bandwidth is empty, "-2" - No bandwidth value that meets LS medium profile minimum bandwidth value. For example - "true" or "false".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBaseOfferIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Offer id of rack rate, prepopulated by OMS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBaseOfferInstanceIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Billing id of rack rate, prepopulated by OMS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillCycleDescriptionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Bill cycle description for the current bill cycle in Wireline Billing System. Read-only.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillCycleInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Current bill cycle in Wireline Billing System. This value will be in the response of getCustomerDetails and client need to send this value as it is back in updatecustomerdetails API.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillingCustomerSubTypeCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid values - "Loyalty","Spend","Vulnerability".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> <xs:enumeration value="Loyalty"/> <xs:enumeration value="Spend"/> <xs:enumeration value="Vulnerability"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillingCustomerTypeCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid value - "Direct Bill".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="40"/> <xs:enumeration value="Direct Bill"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceBillingTelephoneNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>FiberService Billing telephone number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="13"/> <xs:maxLength value="13"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceChargeDescriptionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Contains the enabler charge description.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="1300"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceCircuitIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fiber service pipe circuitId. For example - A6/MCXX/000108//SB</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceComponentDisplayNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the component to be diplayed. For example - "ATT U-verse TV"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceComponentTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Code describing the type of the component. For example - U-verse TV, HSIA, CVOIP, VOIPLN, VOIPDL, CW</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceControlTimeStamp"> <xs:restriction base="xs:int"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceCrossProductPackageIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CrossProductPackage ID. The customer can choose between selecting couponid or cross product package id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceCustomerTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Customer type. [ I = {Consumer}, B = Business, L = Lightspeed ]. B and L is supported only in InquireWirelineCreditVerificationQuestions interface.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceElementKeyInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>ACS Element key will contain the code by which the URL type would be identified. For example - LVLEM - Learn More LVPIC - Picture LVTXT - Text LVPRC - Price</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceElementValueInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It will contain URL against the key. For example - hyperLink="https://uma.att.com/retrieveCatalogContent?APPID=acsITEMTYPE=COMPONENTITEMID=TMCDOCTYPE=TEXTFORMAT=INLINE"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="512"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceExhaustCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fiber service facility exhaust conditions. B=Bonded pair exhaust (granite)*only one port avail for pair bonding BB=Bonded pair exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary BP=Bonded pair exhaust and YZP on primary BS=Bonded pair exhaust and YZP on secondary C=Card exhaust (granite) CB=Card exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary CP=Card exhaust and YZP on primary CS=Card exhaust and YZP on secondary P=Port exhaust (granite) PB=Port exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary PP=Port exhaust and YZP on primary PS=Port exhaust and YZP on secondary S=Shelf exhaust (granite) SB=Shelf exhaust and YZP on primary and secondary SP=Shelf exhaust and YZP on primary SS=Shelf exhaust and YZP on secondary YB=YZP on both primary and secondary YP=YZP on primary YS=YZP on secondary UN=Unconditioned and NO exhaust BU=Unconditioned and Bonded Pair Exhaust CU=Unconditioned and Card Exhaust PU=Unconditioned and Port Exhaust SU=Unconditioned and Shelf Exhaust</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="BB"/> <xs:enumeration value="BP"/> <xs:enumeration value="BS"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="CB"/> <xs:enumeration value="CP"/> <xs:enumeration value="CS"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="PB"/> <xs:enumeration value="PP"/> <xs:enumeration value="PS"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="SB"/> <xs:enumeration value="SP"/> <xs:enumeration value="SS"/> <xs:enumeration value="YB"/> <xs:enumeration value="YP"/> <xs:enumeration value="YS"/> <xs:enumeration value="UN"/> <xs:enumeration value="BU"/> <xs:enumeration value="CU"/> <xs:enumeration value="PU"/> <xs:enumeration value="SU"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMemberIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The unverified member id in email address format. For example - qay2002@att.net</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="51"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMessageDetailCodeInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMessageDetailDescriptionInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="256"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceMessageDetailSeverityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Valid values - "Info", "Warning", "USER_ERROR"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceNADTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fiber service last Network Access Device type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="INID"/> <xs:enumeration value="RG"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Product category/service. For example - "HDSTREAM", "SDSTREAM", "HSIAPRO", "HSIAELITE", "HSIAEXPRESS", "CVOIP".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceNetworkTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of network transport. For example - "FTTP", "FTTN", "GPON", "RGPON".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderActionIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>OrderActionId is the unique key for the OrderAction of a particular product</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderActionNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type of order action:[PR - "Provide", CH - "Change", CE - "Cease", SU - "Suspend", RS - "Resume", CW-"ChangeOwner", SS- "SoftSuspend", SR-"SoftResume" , PV-"ProvideMove" , CM-"CeaseMove"]</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PR"/> <xs:enumeration value="CH"/> <xs:enumeration value="CE"/> <xs:enumeration value="SU"/> <xs:enumeration value="RS"/> <xs:enumeration value="CW"/> <xs:enumeration value="SS"/> <xs:enumeration value="SR"/> <xs:enumeration value="PV"/> <xs:enumeration value="CM"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SRM-BIS Order Number. Example:"N2051234345"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceOrderedItemsActivityNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This attribute depends upon the order action (Provide / Change). For example - acsAssignedProductView.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="2000"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePaperBillSuppressionIndInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Paper bill suppression indicator in Wireline Billing System "N" ? {no paper} "F" ? {full paper}</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceParentApidInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Ap id of rack rate that promotion belong to, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "987654321".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceProductIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A unique identifier of the product in OMS. This is an ID generated by OMS. Used only by acs for internal purpose. For example - "600046057"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceProductRelationIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Product Catalog relation ID this item implements. For example - "2110660"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionCustSubTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion customer subtype, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "S".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionDMAInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion DMA, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "4444".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionDVRInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion DVR, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "Y".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionFreeSTBIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion free STB indicator, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "Y".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionHDSDNumInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion HD/SD number, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "0".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="5"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionHDSDdefinitionInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion HDSD definition, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "SD".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionIPNumInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion ip number, prepopulated by OMS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionPackageTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion package type, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "U300".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionPortalInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion portal, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "Yahoo! Broadband".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="16"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionPrimaryIndicatorInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion primary indicator, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "A".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionRankInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion ranking (the lowest ranking is the best), prepopulated by OMS. For example - "9999".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionSaleTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion sale type (basic or additional/stackable promotion), prepopulated by OMS. Valid values - "B", "A".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="15"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionSpeedInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion speed, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "Express".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServicePromotionStreamInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Promotion Stream, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "I".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceRecPymTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment method code in Wireline Billing System if the customer is enrolled in a recurring payment. The field is empty if the customer is not enrolled in a recurring payment. Read-only. Valid values are R ? credit card A ? direct pay P ? pinless debit.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceSalesOfferModeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>SOM of promotion, prepopulated by OMS. For example - "Online".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="30"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FiberServiceTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Fiber service core component type. Valid values are given below CVOIP, HSIA, VBP.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FirstNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="32"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="FormattedNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="65"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="HandicapIndInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Default Value: false. Valid values are "Y", "N".</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:boolean"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IdentificationIssuingAuthorityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification Issuing Authority i.e. state code for Drivers Licenses</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IdentificationTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identification Type DriversLicense = DL</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="DL"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LanguageInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The language of the account.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LanguagePreferenceInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Language Indicator: English Standard = E, Spanish Standard = S, English Prorated = N, Spanish Prorated = P, Braille = B, Large Font = L, French = F, Vietnamese = V, Mandarin = M, Cantonese = C, Korean = K, Tagalong = T, Japanese = J</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> <xs:enumeration value="N"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="V"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="K"/> <xs:enumeration value="T"/> <xs:enumeration value="J"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LastNameInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="60"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LegalEntityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Legal Entity code. For example - TT00</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="4"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LinkKeyInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Link Key - contains the code to describe the type of address or contact. Address: M - ServiceUSPS U - ServiceSAG D - ServiceFSP B - Billing F - Shipping E - Alternate P - PPU_ADDR G - MSAG_ADD_TYPE L - CLEC_ADD_TYPE H - Directory Listing I - E911
Contact: C - Primary Contact A - Authorized S - Lead</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="M"/> <xs:enumeration value="U"/> <xs:enumeration value="D"/> <xs:enumeration value="B"/> <xs:enumeration value="F"/> <xs:enumeration value="E"/> <xs:enumeration value="P"/> <xs:enumeration value="G"/> <xs:enumeration value="L"/> <xs:enumeration value="H"/> <xs:enumeration value="I"/> <xs:enumeration value="C"/> <xs:enumeration value="A"/> <xs:enumeration value="S"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="LocationInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Location code for the physical/logical store being commissioned.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OfferDefinitionIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Used only by acs for internal purpose. Product Catalogue Identifier. For example - 2000021</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="10"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="OfferingCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Cingular Billing System Code for an offering (Telegence SOC or CARE Feature).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PhoneNpaNxxInfo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="6"/> <xs:pattern value="\d{6}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreferredContactModeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Preferred contact mode. For example - Primary Phone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PropertyIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Will hold the propertyID. Only for acs use. For example - "2000405"</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PropertyNameInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Name of the property. Only for acs use. For example - Which U-verse TV package would you like?</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="80"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="RateCenterCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rate Center code. For example - ALHAMBRA.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SalesChannelInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Values such as COR - Retail applications, WEB - Online applications, WCC - Wireline Call Center, CSR - Customer Service Representative, IVR - Interactive Voice Response, SOE - Sales Order Entry, SYSX - System X</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="WEB"/> <xs:enumeration value="COR"/> <xs:enumeration value="WCC"/> <xs:enumeration value="CSR"/> <xs:enumeration value="IVR"/> <xs:enumeration value="SOE"/> <xs:enumeration value="TE"/> <xs:enumeration value="ITV"/> <xs:enumeration value="SYSX"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SalesRepresentativeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Sales Representative ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="9"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SatelliteAccessCardIdInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Satellite Access Card Id Information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DO NOT USE THIS TYPE IN SCHEMAS - Base type for encrypted elements, Always use derived/extended types listed below</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedDateOfBirthInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Date of Birth The following formats is accepted: YYYY-MM-DD Where : - YYYY indicates the year - MM indicates the month - DD indicates the day EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: BIRTH_DATE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:pattern value="\S{4}-\S{2}-\S{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedGenericInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Used for data that needs to be BASE64 encoded. Clients who are volted need to pass in a minimum of 15 characters - see the CSO BASE64 documentation to find details on how to pad stings to reach the 15 character limit. Following special charcaters are pass through [space] EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: B64_GENERIC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedNumericPassCodeInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Pin .When sending plain text - only numeric values are allowed. Following are pass through characters space & - ; @ \ ^ | EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: ALLNUM_PIN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="4"/> <xs:maxLength value="20"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedPersonalIdentificationInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Personal Ids. Characters must be UPPER CASE. Ex:Drivers License Number and other personal Ids. Dashes are pass through characters. EFPE Format used to encrypt or decrypt this value: DRIVER_LIC_NUM</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="SecureEncryptedBaseTypeInfo"> <xs:minLength value="6"/> <xs:maxLength value="25"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SecureEncryptedSocialSecurityNumberInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Encrypted or Plain Text Social Security Number, also used for Business Tax Id. When sending plain text send only numbers. Dashes are pass through characters. base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="0"/> <xs:maxLength value="255"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bundleActionType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Applicable action type for the bundle NP-A: New Titan customer has no existing Titan supported services NP-US: New Titan customer has existing Core Products ATT services (e.g. existing wireless on M-TLG , DTV, etc) and adds a Core Product (Uverse, core Generic IP services, new Wireless or DTV). CH-US: Existing Titan customer adds another Core Product (e.g. U-verse customer adds new wireless converge and/or DTV, Mobility Titan adds U-verse and/or DTV) or/and an existing Titan customer with Uverse, adds one or more core Uverse services (ex. IPTV, HSIA, CVOIP, Generic IP). NP-C: A customer without an existing Titan Ban requests a wireless BAN to be converged bill (for new or existing wireless customer) and there are no Titan bundles available to be returned for any other action types (e.g. Upsell , NP-A, etc) except Save. CH-C: A customer with existing products/ services, on a Titan BAN, requests an existing wireless to be converged bill and there are no Titan bundles available to be returned for Upsell and Upgrade Action Types any other action types (e.g. Upsell , Upgrade,etc) CH-UG: Existing Titan customer selects to upgrade IPTV Basic Package, HSIA Speed, Voice Usage Plan, and/or GenIP services. CH-S: Base on rep profile in CRM channel and selection (de-selection) rules and based on Titan 5.1 user and customer eligibility rules for System X channel. CH-O: Based on no other Action Type being applicable or only the Save action type is applicable. (unconverted legacy DTV, still billed in STMS but has a shell account in Enabler for combined-bill purposes) c. ?New_DTV? (previously indicated by enum = ?N?) -new DTV standalone or unified account, natively billed in Enabler d. ?Converted_DTV?
